00101   premiere_face_interne=la_zone->premiere_face_int();

00120 template <class _TYPE_>
00121 DoubleTab& T_It_Sou_VDF_Face<_TYPE_>::ajouter(DoubleTab& resu) const
00122 {
00123   ((_TYPE_&) (evaluateur_source_face)).mettre_a_jour( );
00124 
00125   assert(resu.nb_dim() < 3);
00126   const int ncomp = resu.line_size();
00127 
00128   DoubleVect& bilan = so_base->bilan();
00129   bilan=0;
00130   int nb_faces_tot = la_zone.valeur().nb_faces_tot();
00131   coef.resize(nb_faces_tot,Array_base::NOCOPY_NOINIT);
00132   coef=1;
00133   if (equation_divisee_par_rho())
00134     {
00135       const Milieu_base& milieu = la_zcl->equation().milieu();
00136       const Champ_base& rho = milieu.masse_volumique();
00137       if (sub_type(Champ_Uniforme,rho))
00138         coef = rho(0,0);
00139       else
00140         {
00141           const DoubleTab& val_rho = rho.valeurs();
00142           const IntTab& face_vois = la_zone.valeur().face_voisins();
00143           const DoubleVect& volumes = la_zone.valeur().volumes();
00144           coef = 0.;
00145           for (int fac=0; fac<nb_faces_tot; fac++)
00146             {
00147               int elem1 = face_vois(fac,0);
00148               int elem2 = face_vois(fac,1);
00149               double vol = 0;
00150               if (elem1!=-1)
00151                 {
00152                   coef(fac) += val_rho(elem1)*volumes(elem1);
00153                   vol += volumes(elem1);
00154                 }
00155               if (elem2!=-1)
00156                 {
00157                   coef(fac) += val_rho(elem2)*volumes(elem2);
00158                   vol += volumes(elem2);
00159                 }
00160               coef(fac) /= vol;
00161             }
00162         }
00163     }
00164   if( ncomp == 1)
00165     {
00166       ajouter_faces_bords(resu) ;
00167       ajouter_faces_internes(resu) ;
00168     }
00169   else
00170     {
00171       ajouter_faces_bords(resu, ncomp) ;
00172       ajouter_faces_internes(resu, ncomp) ;
00173     }
00174   return resu;
00175 }
00176 template <class _TYPE_>
00177 DoubleTab& T_It_Sou_VDF_Face<_TYPE_>::ajouter_faces_bords(DoubleTab& resu) const
00178 {
00179   int num_cl;
00180   int num_face;
00181   DoubleVect& bilan = so_base->bilan();
00182   for (num_cl =0; num_cl<la_zone->nb_front_Cl(); num_cl++)
00183     {
00184       const Cond_lim& la_cl = la_zcl->les_conditions_limites(num_cl);
00185       const Front_VF& le_bord = ref_cast(Front_VF,la_cl.frontiere_dis());
00186       int ndeb = le_bord.num_premiere_face();
00187       int nfin = ndeb + le_bord.nb_faces();
00188       if ( (sub_type(Dirichlet,la_cl.valeur()))
00189            ||
00190            (sub_type(Dirichlet_homogene,la_cl.valeur()))
00191          )
00192         ;
00193       else
00194         for (num_face=ndeb; num_face<nfin; num_face++)
00195           {
00196             double source = evaluateur_source_face.calculer_terme_source_bord(num_face);
00197             resu(num_face) += source;
00198             double contribution = (faces_doubles(num_face)==1) ? 0.5 : 1 ;
00199             bilan(0) += contribution * coef(num_face) * source;
00200           }
00201     }
00202   return resu;
00203 }
00204 template <class _TYPE_>
00205 DoubleTab& T_It_Sou_VDF_Face<_TYPE_>::ajouter_faces_bords(DoubleTab& resu,int ncomp) const
00206 {
00207   int num_cl;
00208   int num_face;
00209   DoubleVect source(ncomp);
00210   DoubleVect& bilan = so_base->bilan();
00211   for (num_cl =0; num_cl<la_zone->nb_front_Cl(); num_cl++)
00212     {
00213       const Cond_lim& la_cl = la_zcl->les_conditions_limites(num_cl);
00214       const Front_VF& le_bord = ref_cast(Front_VF,la_cl.frontiere_dis());
00215       int ndeb = le_bord.num_premiere_face();
00216       int nfin = ndeb + le_bord.nb_faces();
00217       if ( (sub_type(Dirichlet,la_cl.valeur()))
00218            || (sub_type(Dirichlet_homogene,la_cl.valeur())) )
00219         ;
00220       else
00221         for (num_face=ndeb; num_face<nfin; num_face++)
00222           {
00223             evaluateur_source_face.calculer_terme_source_bord(num_face,source);
00224             for (int k=0; k<ncomp; k++)
00225               {
00226                 resu(num_face,k) += source(k);
00227                 double contribution = (faces_doubles(num_face)==1) ? 0.5 : 1 ;
00228                 bilan(k) += contribution * coef(num_face) * source(k);
00229               }
00230           }
00231     }
00232   return resu;
00233 }
00234 template <class _TYPE_>
00235 DoubleTab& T_It_Sou_VDF_Face<_TYPE_>::ajouter_faces_internes(DoubleTab& resu) const
00236 {
00237   DoubleVect& bilan = so_base->bilan();
00238   for (int num_face=premiere_face_interne; num_face<nb_faces; num_face++)
00239     {
00240       double source = evaluateur_source_face.calculer_terme_source(num_face);
00241       resu(num_face) += source;
00242       double contribution = (faces_doubles(num_face)==1) ? 0.5 : 1 ;
00243       bilan(0) += contribution * coef(num_face) * source;
00244     }
00245   return resu;
00246 }
00247 template <class _TYPE_>
00248 DoubleTab& T_It_Sou_VDF_Face<_TYPE_>::ajouter_faces_internes(DoubleTab& resu,int ncomp) const
00249 {
00250   DoubleVect source(ncomp);
00251   DoubleVect& bilan = so_base->bilan();
00252   for (int num_face=premiere_face_interne; num_face<nb_faces; num_face++)
00253     {
00254       evaluateur_source_face.calculer_terme_source(num_face,source);
00255       for (int k=0; k<ncomp; k++)
00256         {
00257           resu(num_face,k) += source(k);
00258           double contribution = (faces_doubles(num_face)==1) ? 0.5 : 1 ;
00259           bilan(k) += contribution * coef(num_face) * source(k);
00260         }
00261     }
00262   return resu;
00263 }
00264 template <class _TYPE_>
00265 DoubleTab& T_It_Sou_VDF_Face<_TYPE_>::calculer(DoubleTab& resu) const
00266 {
00267   resu=0;
00268   return ajouter(resu);
00269 }
